Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
--Pause/the/rotation!
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end
--Pause/the/rotation!
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if UseCD then
UseCD = false print("Cooldowns disabled!")
else
UseCD = true print("Cooldowns enabled!")
end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Essen") or UnitBuff("player", "Trinken") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Gifte
Ability.Lua:
if applypoison and GetTime() - applypoison > 4 then applypoison = nil end if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and applypoison == nil then
local activepoisons = { "Sofort Wirkendes Gift IX", "Tödliches Gift IX" } local _,poisonMH,_,_,poisonOH,_,_,poisonTR = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() applypoison = GetTime()
if poisonMH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[1],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end elseif poisonOH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[2],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(17) end end
end

Ability.Name: All:Verstohlenheit
Ability.Lua: if IsStealthed() == nil and IsMounted() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Verstümmeln
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Verstümmeln", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Vergiften
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and UnitBuffID("player", 57993) == nil and IsSpellInRange("Vergiften", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Schurkenhandel
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("focus") and (not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus")) and UnitExists("focus") then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Blutgier
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 51662) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Zerhäckseln
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 6774) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Erdrosseln
USE:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: Muti:Kaltblütigkeit
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Finsterer Stoß
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Finsterer Stoß", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Ausweiden
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Finsterer Stoß", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Adrenalinrausch
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Finsterer Stoß", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Mordlust
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Finsterer Stoß", "target") == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 13750) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Klingenwirbel
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Finsterer Stoß", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Poison
Ability.Lua:
if applypoison and GetTime() - applypoison > 4 then applypoison = nil end if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and applypoison == nil then
local activepoisons = { "Instant Poison IX", "Instant Poison IX" } local _,poisonMH,_,_,poisonOH,_,_,poisonTR = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() applypoison = GetTime()
if poisonMH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[1],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end elseif poisonOH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[2],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(17) end end
end

Ability.Name: All:Tricks of the Trade
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("focus") and (not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus")) and UnitExists("focus") then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Stealth
Ability.Lua: if IsStealthed() == nil and IsMounted() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Adrenaline Rush
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Eviscerate
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Sinister Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Blade Flurry
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Kampf: Killing Spree
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 13750) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Hunger For Blood
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 51662) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti: Garrote
Muti:Cold Blood
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Envenom
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and UnitBuffID("player", 57993) == nil and IsSpellInRange("Envenom", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Mutilate
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Slice and Dice
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 6774) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti: Rupture
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 48672, "player") == nil and GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Muti:Expose Armor
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 8647, "player") == nil and GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end
